file_content.text: Without Elric Organa feeding them information, House Thul's on a losing streak. All thanks to you.
Elric Organa is dead. He tried to fight his way out.
With a little help from Thul soldiers, I hear. As if we needed any more evidence he was a traitor.
Would have been nice to question him, but this was no less than he deserves. Thanks for the help.
Find Elric Organa--if the scum hasn't run to House Thul by now.
Wait. Wasn't expecting a whole squad, but Elric might have backup.
I hoped you'd pass my way, Master Jedi. I need someone persuasive.
Need some help, Lieutenant. Not much time, so I'll brief you quick.
Don't know you or your business. Just what I need, if you're willing.
Agent Tyuth, SIS. Republic forces can't seem to hold this area, and now we know why. A traitor named Elric Organa.
Every order we send to House Organa, Elric sends on to House Thul. We've lost several fortifications and a lot of men.
Why would Elric betray his own house?
But Organa's his blood!
Credits? Thul threats? Doesn't matter to me. Treason is treason.
You need backup?
That's like using a sandbag to stop a flood. Gotta plug the leak.
So go arrest him.
Elric seems to disappear whenever I enter his camp. The other nobles say he's acting strange, paranoid, jumpy.
I come near him again, he might get scared. He'll head straight for House Thul, and we'll never get him back.
Elric wouldn't get the chance with me.
I'd like to help.
Once he sees you, I don't think he'll want to try.
You're not the most subtle agent I've met.
Can't blame him.
Some of us find the traitors. Others handle the interrogations.
This isn't my job.
You've beaten the best from here to Coruscant, but Elric doesn't know you. He won't suspect a thing.
All you have to do is find him and confront him. If he's smart, he'll turn himself in then and there.
Elric's gone this far. Why surrender now?
And if he's not?
His funeral. You've got my authorization to take him down.
One way to find out.
Move fast. Man's so jittery he might bolt before you get there.
Can't help you. [Refuse quest]
Alderaan's at war. If you're not gonna help, why are you here?
Keep your eyes open. Not everyone around here's loyal to House Organa--or the Republic.
